alert.note: Alert for Yukon Delta (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Coastal Flood Watch issued September 14 at 1:15PM AKDT until September 18 at 10:00AM AKDT by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...COASTAL FLOOD WATCH IN EFFECT FROM FRIDAY AFTERNOON THROUGH SUNDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Significant coastal flooding possible. * WHERE...Yukon Delta. * WHEN...From Friday afternoon through Sunday morning. * IMPACTS...Low lying areas could flood. Some critical infrastructure may be inundated. Some shoreline erosion may occur. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Water levels are expected to rise 5 to 8 feet above normal high tides. Highest water levels are expected Saturday.
info.instruction: If travel is required, allow extra time as some roads may be closed. Do not drive around barricades or through water of unknown depth. Take the necessary actions to protect flood-prone property.
